Package pkgMain

Class Model

java.lang.Object
pkgMain.Model
public class Model
extends java.lang.Object
Model Class, keeps track of all the Entered Garden Values and Plants and Leps present for the Garden
Author:
zehezack, mattweis, mnlight, bnewlin, brypal
